snippet: Investment firms and their principals are not A.T.M.'s; they should be treated as advocates and resources. They are members of a start-up company's team and should be kept informed of developments.
abstract: Investment firms and their principals are not A.T.M.'s; they should be treated as advocates and resources. They are members of a start-up company's team and should be kept informed of developments.

headline.main: Keeping the Lines of Communication Open
